name: UWP Group
description: UWP are a leading digital marketing agency based in Farringdon, London. We like to think the quality of our staff sets us apart. But we would say that. Here’s a little bit on some of our key members of staff so you can decide. Neale joined UWP in early 2011 and heads up our web development team. He’s formerly head of IT at a leading global investment management company and also owned his own IT company for several years.
